name: Mixed Berry Muffin Smoothie
description: Ridiculously yummy, this packs a berry-good flavour that tastes like a freshly baked muffin. The banana not only adds natural sweetness but also bumps potassium uptake. Plus, one scoop of protein powder gives you 20% of the daily need for potassium. A great way to start your morning!
